channel.title: 中美贸易战对印度的影响
channel.description: 中美贸易战对印度的影响

item.title: 中美贸易战对印度的影响[0-50]
item.description:
中美贸易战对印度的影响 US-China trade war: How it may impact India中美贸易战对印度的影响 http://i.santaihu.com/india/2019-05-19/b26f1ccae7bb265ff9ffcde2d208af86.jpg印度时报读者的评论：Indian• 3 days agodue to demonization, Indian economics near to crash, & it will last 3 to 4 more year, a complete recession.废钞令导致印度经济几近崩溃，而且还将持续3到4年，直至陷入完全衰退。
Tvkon• Unknown • 3 days agoIndia should setup more business and industry clusters as China has. This will drastically improve Indian business. Current challenge in India is lack of such clusters and that increases logistic expenses to produce any product印度应该像中国一样打造更多的商业和产业集群，这将大大促进印度商业的发展。目前印度面临的挑战就是缺乏这样的集群，这增加了产品的物流成本。
PARTAP SINGH MAURYA• 3 days agoWorld may get affected by this but not bhakts,这个世界可能会受到影响，但印度不会。
Dharmendra Kumar• Patna • 3 days agoWith 125 crore population and selection of govt. at 5year interval at centre and state level is all that necessary to run India.印度拥有12.5亿人口，中央和邦一级政府每隔5年选举一次，这便足以确保印度的运转。
King_maker69• 3 days agoNo trade war is ever going to help the growing overpopulation of Indian union.,200 million a year increase in the population is like a ticking time bomb for civil war.,Only a fool will think the future of Indian union is bright. No wonder why many millionaires are running away from Indian union.,I am sure Indian union will split especially the rich states who are suffering because of the poor states.没有一场贸易战能够阻止印度人口的不断增长。每年2亿的人口增长就像一颗定时诈弹，随时可能引发内战。只有傻瓜才会认为印度的未来是光明的。难怪许多百万富翁正在逃离印度。我认为印度将会分裂，尤其是那些被贫穷邦而受拖累的富裕邦。
Reddy• 3 days agoIndia heading to 8-10 trillion economy with third world America collapse to 8-10 trillion随着美国经济规模衰退至8-10万亿美元，印度经济规模正壮大到8-10万亿美元。
Reddy• 3 days agoThe China to become world biggest economy with America collapse to 10 trillion. The Chinese yuan can be reserve, rupee, yen can be dominant global currency. The America already look third world country start doing hard labour, start working and pay debts to world.随着美国经济的崩溃，中国将成为世界上最大的经济体。人民币将成为储备货币，卢比、日元成为全球主导货币。美国看起来已经是**国家了，开始做苦力并向世界偿还债务。
Gus Sinha• Virginia • 3 days agopresence of Modiji will be crucial who works selflessly for Indian people.莫迪无私地为印度人民服务，他的连任至关重要。
Jai Shree Raam• Unknown • 3 days agono impact on India对印度没影响
Bilawal• 3 days agosoon india will be colony on america.. right now Indian army and Raw in the hands of America and Israel... soon people will be in hands of america.. keep going on it's good for nothing不久印度将成为美国的殖民地。现在，印度军队受制于美国和以色列…很快印度人也会被美国控制。再这么下去，没有任何好处。
tvenak B• US • 3 days agoThe problem with shifting manufacturing to India is lack of dependability and cost of labor in the long run. Unlike in China, labor in India is more vocal and can resort to strikes. In Chinese system, labor works. And in India labor asks 10 questions before even starting the work,从长远来看，将制造业转移到印度的问题在于劳动力成本和技能。与中国不同，印度的劳工更有发言权，想罢工就罢工。在中国，工人卖命干活。
Sushant Sinha• Unknown • 3 days agoWaiting to see india being manufacturing hub坐等印度成为制造业中心
Pdev• Location • 3 days agoIt will benifit India, this is a setup by Americans to dump China manufacturing facilities and adopt in India.,Super cool, India should grab it for good!!这将使印度受益，这是美国人为了摆脱中国制造，转而在印度生产的一种策略。太酷了，印度应该抓住这个机遇!
Batman• 3 days agoTo become an alternate source for US imports and beat Chinese prices is a difficult and lengthy task for India....It took china 40 years to reach where it is today.....India will take even longer...lets face the facts rather than jumping ....对印度来说，成为美国进口商品的替代来源，然后价格上对中国有优势，是一项艰巨而漫长的任务……中国花了40年才达到今天的水平……印度将需要更长的时间…让我们面对事实，不要想着一步登天…
Vijay Kadam• Pune, Maharashtra • 3 days agoI think USA China Trade war is opportunity for India to grow. We should increase our export to USA as China''s export to USA is almost 500 billion. If we were able to capture at least 100 billion share still it will be boost to our economy我认为对印度而言，美中贸易战是印度发展的机会。我们应该增加对美国的出口。中国对美国的出口接近5000亿美元。如果我们能够获得至少1000亿美元的份额，这将推动我们的经济发展。
Shaun Xalin Unknown • 3 days agokill each other''s economy and in between this events a new guy would slip-in to become a new economic power.鹬蚌相争，渔翁得利。印度将成为一个新的经济强国。
vijay• Pune • 3 days agoThe opportunity has presented itself. If it''s not grabbed we will have to wait for another Trump to give it to us on a platter.,And I don''t think Americans are that foolish.机会来了，如果这次抓不住，我们将不得不等待下一个特朗普出现了。
Omprakash• 3 days agoIn present world Market play big role in International Politics.在当今世界，市场在国际政治中发挥着重要作用。
Islamic Republic Of India • 3 days agoIndia is a pathetic losers and no match to Pakistan let alone China.印度是个可悲的失败者，根本无法与巴基斯坦匹敌，更不用说抗衡中国了。
Muthuswami Yegnaswami8802 Muthuswami-Amritsar-3 days ago -FollowIndia will be the biggest gainer.Thanks to Modi.Make in India will be unlimited.India will become the best country in the world by 2029印度将是最大的受益者，这都多亏了莫迪。印度制造的前途无限。到2029年，印度将成为世界上最强的国家
S156S-Kolkata-3 days ago -FollowThe one man who can capitalize the US-China trade war, is Mr. Modi... the Indians have voted sensibly to bring him back....能让印度从美中贸易战中获利的只有莫迪……印度人要明智点，投票给莫迪，让莫迪连任。
India should play its card well. Infrastructure investment is satisfactory. It should accelerate. Single factor will be red tape and land availability. These will have to be resolved, so that foreign companies can set up factories at shortest possible time and start to operate. This is the key印度要打好这手牌。加速基础设施建设，精简手续，提供建厂的土地。这些问题必须得到解决，以便外国公司能够在尽可能短的时间内建厂并开始运营，这是关键。
BE INDIAN4950 BE INDIAN-3 days ago -FollowIndia could have benefited from this ongoing trade war between US and China. But our country is so divided and social harmony is jeopardy, we are not able to focus on development. Just look at these election campaign, Modi and BJP is not talking about development anymore. They are trying to divide people and cling to power and call themselves as patriotic. Our current government is run by a bunch of losers who have no clue.印度本可以从这场正在进行的美中贸易战中获益，但是我们的国家是如此分裂，社会不和谐，不能集中精力发展经济。看看现在的竞选活动，莫迪和人民党不再谈论发展了。他们试图分裂人民，紧握权力，还自称爱国。我们现在的政府是由一群毫无头绪的失败者管理的。
Shailendra Kumar Mishra4816 Shailendra Kumar Mishra-kolkata-3 days ago -FollowGood for INDIA!!!!!!!!Chess game in full swing, India must seek the right oppurtinity.对印度来说是好事棋局正如火如荼，印度必须抓住机会。
Fakir10808 Fakir -Rajendra Nagar-3 days ago -FollowUnfortunately India is in no way ready to take advantage. Manufacturing, exports and jobs are at an all time low. Thank you Modi.不幸的是，印度还没有准备好利用这一有利局势。制造业、出口和就业都处于历史最低点。这都拜莫迪所赐。
Ayu Jai753 Ayu Jai-3 days ago -FollowOnly modi can invite global co.s like he did for tata in gujarat只有莫迪才能邀请国际公司来印度投资，就像他在古吉拉特邦为塔塔所做的那样。
Khaled Shines617 Khaled Shines-3 days ago -FollowGolden Opportunity for India only if India had an educated Prime Minister not a Jumla baaz !如果印度有一个有学识的总理，而不是一个爱吹牛的，那这确实是个好机会!
Guest2107 Guest-3 days ago -FollowIt is not only US-China trade war, but also US-India trade war. But Modi Govt is not acknowledging it keeping seat in US lap. some lessons must be learnt and this also must be Indo-Sino trade war.这不仅是中美贸易战，也是美印贸易战。莫迪政府不觉得印度在美国面前有一席之地
Mangesh Agrawal5037 Mangesh Agrawal-3 days ago -FollowIt is good for India这对印度有好处
Ulhas Kulkarni14448Ulhas-Navi Mumbai-3 days ago -FollowChina owns trillions in US treasury bills. Can DESTROY US economy in no time.中国持有数万亿美元美国国债，不费功夫就能摧毁美国经济。
Punit 815 Punit-India-4 days ago -FollowThis can be a good opportunity for india. but same govt must come again这对印度来说是个好机会，但是莫迪政府必须连任。
Akhil Venugopal1180 Akhil Venugopal-Dubai, United Arab Emira-4 days ago -FollowVital time for india, you need a stable govt this time here.not any gadbandhans to reep the harvest这对印度来说，是个关键时刻，需要一个稳定的政府
Patriot - 3 days ago -FollowIn that case India can export more but it has to make quality products.在这种情况下，印度可以扩大出口，前提必须提高产品质量
Ram Dularay Verma - Lucknow - 3 days ago -FollowModi government is very crazy of purchasing and importing goods produced by America and its ally .Cost is immaterial .莫迪政府非常热衷于购买和进口美国及其盟友的商品。（评论来自印度时报，译者：Jessica.Wu）

Unlike in China, labor in India is more vocal and can resort to strikes. In Chinese system, labor works. And in India labor asks 10 questions before even starting the work,从长远来看，将制造业转移到印度的问题在于劳动力成本和技能。与中国不同，印度的劳工更有发言权，想罢工就罢工。在中国，工人卖命干活。

India should play its card well. Infrastructure investment is satisfactory. It should accelerate. Single factor will be red tape and land availability. These will have to be resolved, so that foreign companies can set up factories at shortest possible time and start to operate. This is the key印度要打好这手牌。加速基础设施建设，精简手续，提供建厂的土地。这些问题必须得到解决，以便外国公司能够在尽可能短的时间内建厂并开始运营，这是关键。

But our country is so divided and social harmony is jeopardy, we are not able to focus on development. Just look at these election campaign, Modi and BJP is not talking about development anymore. They are trying to divide people and cling to power and call themselves as patriotic. Our current government is run by a bunch of losers who have no clue.印度本可以从这场正在进行的美中贸易战中获益，但是我们的国家是如此分裂，社会不和谐，不能集中精力发展经济。看看现在的竞选活动，莫迪和人民党不再谈论发展了。他们试图分裂人民，紧握权力，还自称爱国。我们现在的政府是由一群毫无头绪的失败者管理的。

嵐色羽空:
好多水军

生年不满百:
看下来就一个想法：投票给莫迪！

大哀之君:
除了党工就是梦话连篇，或者我不应该用“除了……就是……”来连接两者
-- 来自 能手机投票的 Stage1官方 Android客户端

戈饭:
莫迪请的水军真多
—— 来自 Meizu M6 Note, Android 7.1.2上的 S1Next-鹅版 v2.1.2

Lamic:
换钞这种骚操作都没事，贸易战确实算不了什么

卡普空:
本帖最后由 卡普空 于 2019-5-19 17:22 编辑
楼上总结很好，就一个思想，投票给莫迪

jctc:
JAI HINDI
还能说什么？

82yang:
Reddy• 3 days ago
India heading to 8-10 trillion economy with third world America collapse to 8-10 trillion
随着美国经济规模衰退至8-10万亿美元，印度经济规模正壮大到8-10万亿美元。
印度了不起
-- 来自 能搜索的 Stage1官方 Android客户端

nemo_mxc:
问就Jai Hind！

zhongjie:
总有一种莫迪是印度蒋委员长的感觉

祖玛教主:
三哥的承受能力确实比我们还强……
嗯
印不起……

REST:
印度网络生态环境和我国没什么区别嘛

woxihuan234:
印度将是最大的受益者，这都多亏了莫迪。
印度制造的前途无限。到2029年，印度将成为世界上最强的国家
嘟嘟嘟嘟嘟嘟嘟嘟嘟嘟嘟嘟嘟嘟嘟嘟嘟嘟嘟嘟嘟嘟嘎！

红茶提督:
